Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for certain death benefits to deputy sheriffs employed by Orange county
Summary: Provides for certain death benefits to deputy sheriffs employed by Orange county.
LawCode: Add ยง606-d, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing certain death benefits to deputy sheriffs employed by Orange county
